attributes.background: Horse riding is slavery: a cruel, unnecessary practice that puts each and every horse through unimaginable horrors and humiliation. Horses were born to roam free on wild, open fields, but they have been captured and broken in for generations, with no reprieve. Help us end this monstrous cruelty!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for horse riding and/or horse ownership to be banned.
